name: happy-hour-put-out-the-fire
title: Happy Hour: Put Out The Fire
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• Earlier this week, a fire tore through a South Nashville apartment complex, displacing 23 families including more than 40 children. So if you’ve got some extra furniture, clothing, household stuff, or a couple extra bucks, please consider sending it their way. [WKRN]
  • Only in Nashville would a doctor make a music video to promote awareness of heart disease, and only in Nashville would that video actually be pretty good. [WKRN]
  • TSU and Fisk collected nearly $2 million in federal grants intended to strengthen historically black colleges. [Tennessean]
  • If all goes according to plan, the revamped Bellevue Center Mall should reopen in early 2013–presumably without that IKEA you guys have been Facebooking for. [Tennessean]

Photo by tamelyn.
